overview: Sweet, sassy Keri has managed to maintain a happy life... Until now! With great friends (who regale her with stories of their sordid sex lives!) and a successful lingerie shop, Keri isn't really in the market for a man. That is, until ex-boyfriend Randy returns after three years and make Keri doubt everything she thought she knew. Can Keri and Randy recapture what they had? Are love and passion enough? After all... they're simply the Bare Necessities!
title: Bare Necessities
